alert.note: Alert for Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; Central and South Weld County; Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 2:16PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...Thunderstorms will develop across portions of south central Weld, northwestern Elbert, central Arapahoe, northeastern Denver and central Adams Counties through 300 PM MDT... At 213 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking developing thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout tornado along a line from Hudson to Bennett to 10 miles east of Parker, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Landspout tornadoes can damage mobile homes, roofs, vehicles, and trees. Outdoor objects may be tossed about. Locations impacted include... Northeastern Aurora, northeastern Denver International Airport, Lochbuie, Hudson, Bennett, Keenesburg, Manila Village, Prospect Valley, Strasburg, Milton Reservoir and Roggen. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If a tornado is spotted seek shelter inside a sturdy building.
